L2_gloss:
down
किताब उंदु पोड़ि ग्याई।kitāb undu poṛi gyāī.Book is fallen down.

on
मे उंदु न पोड़िदीme undu na poṛidīDon't fall on me.
(transitive) to move, (causative) to cause to move

six
छै बजि ― chai baji ― six o'clock
(intransitive) to go, (auxiliary) Used to mark that

genitive of तांउ (tā̃u); your
त्यारु नाम की छ?tyāru nām kī cha?What is your name?
on to, किताबमथि किताब च।kitābmathi kitāb ca.There is

have
मेमा यअक किताब न्ही च।memā yaak kitāb nhī ca.I don't have a book.
